options.content:
Individual Globus Tasks

This dashboard shows per-Globus Task level data, given a particular source and destination organization.
The table shows the volume, rate, duration (in hours, minutes and seconds) for the top 1000 largest tasks.
Click on the timestamp of an individual task to show more detailed information about that task.
Globus Tasks have been de-identified and confidential data has been marked "UNAVAILABLE". Confidential Task data rates and totals are available via the toggle at the top of this dashboard.
All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_organization:$src AND meta.dst_organization:$dest AND (meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw}) AND meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (( (!(_exists_:meta.src_ip)) OR meta.src_ip:${subnet.regex}*) OR ( (!(_exists_:meta.dst_ip)) OR meta.dst_ip:${subnet.regex}*))
